Locale.Value:
Font Update
We are excited to introduce new fonts to enhance your PDF signing experience! These fonts are sourced from Google Fonts and strictly follow the Open Font License (OFL) principles.
PDF Signing Experience Boosted:
- Introduced additional date formats.
- Effortlessly add your signature via the Ribbon area.
Legal & Acknowledgements
The fonts we've integrated from Google Fonts adhere to the Open Font License. For more details on the Open Font License, users can visit:https://scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?site_id=nrsi&id=OFL
